short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a cool overview of the solar system on your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Solar Info provides a visually appealing overview of our solar system right on your new tab. Explore the celestial wonders in an easy-to-digest format, keeping your curiosity about the cosmos within reach. Embark on a journey through space without leaving your browser.
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.getsolarinfo.net/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.getsolarinfo.net/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.getsolarinfo.net/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.getsolarinfo.net/terms.html#terms-contact
About Us : https://www.getsolarinfo.net/about.html

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
